DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female patient , age ≥ 18 ≤ 80 year . 2 . Male female , age ≥ 50 year healthy volunteer group 3 . No heart pathology ( volunteer ) 4 . PAF , Pers AF Ls Pers AF ( ECG document ) . 5 . LVEF ≥ 50 % 6 . Able provide write informed consent 7 . Able comply requirement study 1 . Previous AF ablation therapy 2 .
